page.title: 13FARMING
page.content:
Most farms in the area are mixed and dairy farms. The dairy farmers grow grass and other crops like hay,silage, corn, stubble-turnips and kale. The cows like these crops but they have to be prepared in a special way like corn.The corn is stored in a tower or bin until needed. When it is needed it is rolled in a mill. After that it is mixed with proteins. The cows eat this mixture twice-a-day at milking times.
The farmers in this area who grow corn have to look after it because there are many leaf and root diseases.The main diseases are Ryncosporium and Mildew. The farmer has to keep these diseases off the flag leaf because it will damage the head of corn. A general fungiside is used for this purpose.
